frontmatter.title: RadioButtonGroup
frontmatter.notes:
Refactor to use Input component
and refresh checkbox designs

props.name: name
props.docblock: specifies the `name` value for the `RadioButtonGroup` so that no more than one `RadioButton` can be selected at any given time

description.text: specifies the `name` value for the `RadioButtonGroup` so that no more than one `RadioButton` can be selected at any given time

props.name: onBlur
props.docblock: specifies the callback for the `onBlur` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

description.text: specifies the callback for the `onBlur` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: specifies the callback for the onChange event for each RadioButton within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

description.text: specifies the callback for the onChange event for each RadioButton within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

props.name: onClick
props.docblock: specifies the callback for the `onClick` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

description.text: specifies the callback for the `onClick` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

props.name: onFocus
props.docblock: specifies the callback for the `onFocus` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

description.text: specifies the callback for the `onFocus` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

props.name: onKeyDown
props.docblock: specifies the callback for the `onKeyDown` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

description.text: specifies the callback for the `onKeyDown` event for each `RadioButton` within the group. The default value is a no-op function.

props.name: selectedIndex
props.docblock: specifies which `RadioButton` is initially selected. The default value is `undefined` which signifies that no `RadioButton` is initially selected.

description.text: specifies which `RadioButton` is initially selected. The default value is `undefined` which signifies that no `RadioButton` is initially selected.
